activities: insightXM provides cloud-based, action-oriented, analytics-driven insights for experiential marketers. We receive individuals' personal information from our customers, third party data providers and from publicly available web sources. We then analyze this data and extract actionable insights our customers can use to help drive their experiential marketing efforts.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Names, companies, physical addresses, email addresses, phone numbers, social media handles, general demographic attributes and interests.
